definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: Variegation The occurrence of patches of different colors on leaves or flowers.
sentences.chinese: 植物叶片或花表面出现的彩色斑块。

sentences.english: Endarterectomy removes fatty plaque through an incision in the neck.
sentences.chinese: 通过在颈部切口去除内膜上的脂肪斑块。

sentences.english: At the 22th week, atheroma and calcification were present.
sentences.chinese: 实验22周时可见粥样斑块形成及管壁钙化。

sentences.english: Bubble lesions, plaque denudation , crater-shaped pits, reduced or disappeared microtriches on the surface of cysts were observed using scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电镜可见蚴囊表面呈斑块状剥蚀及喷火口样凹陷。

sentences.english: Why do plaques and tangles form?
sentences.chinese: 为什么会产生斑块和纠缠？

sentences.english: The open, needle-like aces in the atheromatous plaque are cholesterol clefts.
sentences.chinese: 在粥样斑块中看到的针状空隙即为胆固醇结晶。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of atorvastatin on arteriosclerosis plaque of carotid artery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨阿托伐他汀对颈动脉粥样斑块的临床影响。

sentences.english: They were all different sizes and shades of orange, with light brown patches.
sentences.chinese: 他们都不同大小和橙色色彩与浅棕色斑块。

sentences.english: Tan-yellow plaques are seen in the lower esophagus, along with mucosal hyperemia.
sentences.chinese: 食管下段可见黄褐色的斑块，同时黏膜充血。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the stability of carotid plaque in young adult with acute cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究颈动脉颅外段斑块稳定性与青中年脑梗死。

sentences.english: This was after a white bear with patches of brown fur was shot by hunters.
sentences.chinese: 当时猎人们射杀了一只长着棕色斑块皮毛白熊。

sentences.english: The open, needle-like spaces in the atheromatous plaque are cholesterol clefts.
sentences.chinese: 在粥样斑块中看到的针状空隙即为胆固醇结晶。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the correlation between aorta atheromatous plaque and cerebral infarction(CI).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉粥样斑块与脑梗死的相关性。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of Tongxinluo capsule in stabilizing vulnerable plaque in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究通心络胶囊在稳定实验兔易损斑块中的作用。

sentences.english: This remodling process is involved in the formation and development of atheroma .
sentences.chinese: 这个重塑过程贯穿整个斑块形成与发展的全过程。

sentences.english: Above the door there is a plaque bearing the same name in both Chinese and Manchurian characters.
sentences.chinese: 门以上有斑块轴承相同的名字在中文和满洲里的角色。

definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: (med.) endothelium/thin skin on the inside of some fruits (e.g. oranges)
